subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams reached the quarterfinals at a major for the first time this year, but Eugenie Bouchard was upset. Novak Djokovic won and will play Andy Murray.
snippet: Serena Williams reached the quarterfinals at a major for the first time this year, but Eugenie Bouchard was upset. Novak Djokovic won and will play Andy Murray.
